document.full_text: three dozen crips street gang members and two motel owners have been indicted for running a prostitution ring that targeted underage girls through social networking sites including myspace, craigslist, twitter and facebook, prosecutors said on monday.
document.title: gang members indicted in online prostitution ring
lines_and_colors: three dozen crips street gang members and two motel owners have been indicted for running a prostitution ring that targeted underage girls through social networking sites including myspace, craigslist, twitter and facebook, prosecutors said on monday.
